body_html:
Yes, I noticed that, but figured it may be useful to update the current docs for users not on the master branch. In any case, let me know if any help is needed for seq2seq documentation. I've been following the object-oriented code in master closely and I'd be happy to help with either.

Along the same lines, are there any other issues that would be good "starter" contributions? Not sure where the best place is for suggesting/asking such things so any info would be useful. I read the contribution guidelines, and they suggested that the comments here are the place to discuss. Thanks!

body:
Yes, I noticed that, but figured it may be useful to update the current docs for users not on the master branch. In any case, let me know if any help is needed for seq2seq documentation. I've been following the object-oriented code in master closely and I'd be happy to help with either.

Along the same lines, are there any other issues that would be good "starter" contributions? Not sure where the best place is for suggesting/asking such things so any info would be useful. I read the contribution guidelines, and they suggested that the comments here are the place to discuss. Thanks!
